medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive shortness of breath lasting for 2 weeks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks prior to the emergency department visit. The patient reported progressive shortness of breath with no previous episodes of wheezing.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diet-controlled diabetes, hypertension, hypothyroidism, hypercholesterolemia, mild chronic renal insufficiency, aortic stenosis, and peptic ulcer disease.
medical_history.social_history: No known allergies and did not smoke.
